hero.title: Streamline Your Business with CRM Pro
hero.description: Manage clients, tasks, and teams effortlessly. Boost productivity and grow your business with our all-in-one CRM solution.

clientManagement.title: Client Management
clientManagement.description: Efficiently organize and track client information, interactions, and history.

taskManagement.title: Task Management
taskManagement.description: Create, assign, and monitor tasks to ensure timely completion of projects.

teamManagement.title: Team Management
teamManagement.description: Manage employees and supervisors, track performance, and optimize workflows.

productivity.title: Increased Productivity
productivity.description: Streamline workflows and automate repetitive tasks.

relationships.title: Better Customer Relationships
relationships.description: Centralize client data for personalized interactions.

decisions.title: Data-Driven Decisions
decisions.description: Gain insights with comprehensive reporting and analytics.

scalable.title: Scalable Solution
scalable.description: Grow your business with a CRM that adapts to your needs.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

delete.title: Delete Selected Projects
delete.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the selected projects and remove their data from our servers.
delete.singleDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this project and remove the data from our servers.

activate.title: Activate Selected Project
activate.description: Are you sure you want to activate the selected project? They will not be able to access the system until deactivated.
activate.singleDescription: Are you sure you want to activate this project? They will not be able to access the system until deactivated.

deactivate.title: Deactivate Selected Project
deactivate.description: Are you sure you want to deactivate the selected project? They will regain access to the system.
deactivate.singleDescription: Are you sure you want to deactivate this project? They will regain access to the system.

message.noProjects: Sorry we couldn't find any projects.
message.noClients: You need to add a client first before creating a project.

delete.title: Delete Selected Clients
delete.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the selected clients and remove their data from our servers.
delete.singleDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this client and remove their data from our servers.

activate.title: Activate Selected Client
activate.description: Are you sure you want to activate the selected client? They will not be able to access the system until deactivated.
activate.singleDescription: Are you sure you want to activate this client? They will not be able to access the system until deactivated.

deactivate.title: Deactivate Selected Client
deactivate.description: Are you sure you want to deactivate the selected client? They will regain access to the system.
deactivate.singleDescription: Are you sure you want to deactivate this client? They will regain access to the system.

empty.message: Sorry we couldn't find any clients.

delete.title: Delete Selected Users
delete.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the selected users and remove their data from our servers.
delete.singleDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this user and remove the data from our servers.

suspend.title: Suspend Selected Users
suspend.description: Are you sure you want to suspend the selected users? They will not be able to access the system until unsuspended.
suspend.singleDescription: Are you sure you want to suspend this user? They will not be able to access the system until unsuspended.

unsuspend.title: Unsuspend Selected Users
unsuspend.description: Are you sure you want to unsuspend the selected users? They will regain access to the system.
unsuspend.singleDescription: Are you sure you want to unsuspend this user? They will regain access to the system.

empty.message: Sorry we couldn't find any users.
Sorry we couldn't find any events.
